title: Standard Delivery Times in Pakistan
text: Domestic deliveries: 2-4 business days within cities, 3-7 days inter-city. Excludes weekends/holidays. Track for exact ETA. Policy: 95% on-time guarantee; delays compensated with PKR 100 credit.

title: Express Delivery Options
text: Express service: Next-day delivery in major cities (Lahore, Karachi, Islamabad) for extra PKR 300. Select at checkout. Policy: Available only for lightweight parcels (<5kg); not for remote areas.

title: Delivery Attempt Policy
text: Two free attempts per order. Third requires rescheduling fee. Failed attempts return to sender after 7 days. Policy: Customer must be available; no-shows count as attempts.

title: Prohibited Items for Shipping
text: Restricted: Weapons, explosives, drugs, perishables (e.g., food without packaging), live animals. Check full list on website. Policy: Violations lead to shipment seizure and legal action per Pakistan Post Act.

title: Hazardous Materials Policy
text: No chemicals, batteries, or flammables. Lithium batteries allowed only in devices (<100Wh). Policy: Special packaging required; non-compliance voids insurance and incurs disposal fees (PKR 500+).

title: Remote Area Deliveries
text: Gilgit-Baltistan, FATA: Additional 5-10 days and PKR 200 surcharge. Policy: Partnered with local couriers; no guarantees for conflict zones.

title: International Delivery Times
text: To Middle East/Asia: 5-10 days; Europe/USA: 7-14 days. Customs add 2-5 days. Policy: Duties paid by recipient; PakShip not liable for customs delays.

title: Valuables and Insurance
text: Jewelry/electronics over PKR 10,000 require declaration and insurance (PKR 50 per PKR 1,000 value). Policy: Uninsured losses not covered; max liability PKR 5,000 without insurance.

title: Alcohol and Tobacco Restrictions
text: Strictly prohibited per Pakistani law. No exceptions. Policy: Discovery results in immediate return or destruction; sender fined PKR 10,000.
